DOC.detailed_description: This study enrol patient visit out-patient department primary complaint tinnitus . A full medical history assessment perform , patient underwent otoscopic examination , basic audiologic evaluation . We select patient whose audiogram data meet inclusion criterion NIHL : 1 ) bilateral typical NIHL audiogram type A tympanogram ; 2 ) hearing threshold 4 kilohertz ( kHz ) great 25 dB hear level ( HL ) ; 3 ) audiogram show characteristic 4 kHz 6 kHz notch ( average hearing threshold 10 dB HL high baseline ) ; 4 ) up-turn phenomenon appear 6 kHz 8 kHz , 5 ) symmetrical hearing loss threshold bilateral ear disparity le 10 dB HL . Patients otologic disease exclude . A full medical history assessment perform , patient complete NIHL questionnaire ( Supplementary S1 ) , audiogram , tympanogram , speech discrimination test , distortion product otoacoustic emission ( DPOAE ) testing , pitch loudness match tinnitus , Tinnitus Handicap Inventory ( THI ) serum zinc level analysis . All test repeat 2 month treatment zinc gluconate ( Zinga 78 mg , 10 mg elemental zinc ) , two tablet twice per day ( 40 mg per day ) .
